name: MindfulTech
signal_source: Digital wellness discussions: 'I want to use technology intentionally but all digital wellness apps are just more apps to manage'
description: Ambient digital wellness coach that promotes intentional technology use without adding to app overwhelm
target_user: Digitally overwhelmed individuals seeking healthier technology relationships without additional complexity
pain_point_evidence: Users seeking digital wellness solutions that don't contribute to the problem of too many apps and notifications
differentiation: Digital wellness through reduction and awareness rather than additional features
subscription_fit: Premium unlocks advanced insights, personalized coaching, and family features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic awareness features, premium unlocks personalized coaching and insights
